messages.message:
hi team, I'm having an issue with this PR (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/71726) and CI

from logs, it's not showing which test is failing but it seems that in previous CI runs on the PR, the unrelated failure was from `//shared-utils/go-utils/src/instabase/searchservice/...` failing which is unrelated with this:

```[2025-06-27T04:48:18.796Z] ======================================================================
[2025-06-27T04:48:18.796Z] FAIL: test_thread_function (test_datastore.TestDatastore)
[2025-06-27T04:48:18.796Z] ----------------------------------------------------------------------
[2025-06-27T04:48:18.796Z] Traceback (most recent call last):
[2025-06-27T04:48:18.796Z]   File "/root/.cache/bazel/_bazel_root/eecbca7b87c7c33fd2d8ffba03ee98a3/sandbox/processwrapper-sandbox/9144/execroot/__main__/bazel-out/k8-fastbuild/bin/shared-utils/py-utils/flow-datastore/test/unit/py/instabase/flow_datastore/test.runfiles/__main__/shared-utils/py-utils/flow-datastore/test/unit/py/instabase/flow_datastore/test_datastore.py", line 369, in test_thread_function
[2025-06-27T04:48:18.797Z]     self.assertTrue(
[2025-06-27T04:48:18.797Z] AssertionError: False is not true : path=mohit/repo/fs/Instabase Drive/files/test_file.file buf_size=0```
Could I get some help merging my PR and investigating this error? cc @Yash Botadra @Anil

Yeah, we’re logging _everything_ now and it is extremely difficult to see the errors and failed tests :disappointed:
This one, I think, failed because of the cuda install error that I have seen a few times now.
```[2025-06-27T17:55:32.983Z]   Command ['/shared/venvs/model-service-2TeO9zso-py3.9/bin/python', '-m', 'pip', 'uninstall', 'nvidia-nvtx-cu12', '-y'] errored with the following return code 2
[2025-06-27T17:55:32.983Z]   
[2025-06-27T17:55:32.983Z]   Output:
[2025-06-27T17:55:32.983Z]   Found existing installation: nvidia-nvtx-cu12 12.1.105
[2025-06-27T17:55:32.983Z]   Uninstalling nvidia-nvtx-cu12-12.1.105:
[2025-06-27T17:55:32.983Z]   ERROR: Exception:
[2025-06-27T17:55:32.983Z]   Traceback (most recent call last):
[2025-06-27T17:55:32.983Z]     File "/home/jenkins/pyenv/versions/3.9.17/lib/python3.9/shutil.py", line 825, in move
[2025-06-27T17:55:32.983Z]       os.rename(src, real_dst)
[2025-06-27T17:55:32.983Z]   OSError: [Errno 18] Invalid cross-device link: '/shared/venvs/model-service-2TeO9zso-py3.9/lib/python3.9/site-packages/nvidia/__init__.py' -> '/tmp/pip-uninstall-80_w5icy/__init__.py'```
I’ll force merge for now.
@Cody Boggs does your instrumenting code capture the output of each test?
It would be great if we could just look at a trace for the test.

It does if it fails, yes, captures the exception as an event in the span :+1: 

That’s only true of the code in my pr though, haven’t merged it yet
I’m gonna be afk shortly but @Victor Zeng if you wanna force merge it feel free!
